p: The infection rate in the mosquitoes fed with 0 ng/ml ivermectin (parallel control group) was 84.62%, which was not significantly higher than the infection rate (81.67%) in the historical control group ( Table 1). And the mosquitoes fed with 0 ng/ml ivermectin were of higher DENV-2 RNA concentrations than mosquitoes in historical control group ( Table 2), verifying the multiplication of DENV-2 inside Aedes albopictus when they were raised from 4 days to 10 days post infectious blood feeding without ivermectin intervention.
